item.title: Biomass Pellets: Complete Guide for Industries in Punjab
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Everything Punjab industries need to know about biomass pellets - from specifications to pricing to implementation.
item.content:encoded:
Everything Punjab industries need to know about biomass pellets - from specifications to pricing to implementation.

What are Biomass Pellets?

Biomass pellets are compressed organic materials used as fuel for industrial boilers and heating systems. Made from agricultural waste like rice husk, paddy straw, and wood chips, these pellets offer a sustainable alternative to coal and other fossil fuels.

Key Benefits

  • 25-40% cost savings compared to coal
  • Lower emissions and cleaner burning
  • Consistent quality and calorific value
  • Easy storage and handling
  • Government subsidies available

Contact Us

For bulk pricing and supply in Punjab, contact Shree Balaji Envirotech, Bathinda.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Biomass Pellets Guide Punjab | Industrial Fuel Solution Bathinda
Complete guide to biomass pellets for industries in Punjab. Learn specifications, pricing, benefits & how to switch from coal. Suppliers in Bathinda.
biomass pellets Punjab

item.title: Stubble Burning in Punjab: How Biomass Pellets Solve the Crisis
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: How Punjab farmers and industries can turn the stubble burning crisis into a profitable opportunity.
item.content:encoded:
How Punjab farmers and industries can turn the stubble burning crisis into a profitable opportunity.

The Stubble Burning Problem

Every year, Punjab farmers burn millions of tons of paddy straw (parali), causing severe air pollution across North India. This practice, while harmful, continues because farmers lack affordable alternatives.

The Biomass Pellet Solution

Converting parali into biomass pellets offers a win-win solution:

  • Farmers earn additional income from crop residue
  • Industries get affordable, clean fuel
  • Environment benefits from reduced emissions
  • Government incentives support the transition

Get Started

Contact Shree Balaji Envirotech for parali collection and pellet supply in Punjab.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Stubble Burning Solution Punjab | Convert Parali to Pellets Bathinda
Stop stubble burning in Punjab. Convert paddy straw (parali) to profitable biomass pellets. Government incentives & buyer connections in Bathinda.

Coal prices continue to rise while environmental regulations tighten. Biomass pellets offer a cost-effective, compliant alternative.

Most industries see payback within 12-18 months with 25-40% fuel cost savings.

item.title: Biomass Pellet Prices in Punjab 2025: Complete Market Analysis
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Current market prices for different types of biomass pellets in Punjab with factors affecting costs.
item.content:encoded:
Current market prices for different types of biomass pellets in Punjab with factors affecting costs.

Current Price Range (2025)

  • Rice Husk Pellets: ₹5,500-6,500/ton
  • Wood Pellets: ₹7,000-8,500/ton
  • Mixed Agro Pellets: ₹5,000-6,000/ton
  • Torrefied Pellets: ₹9,000-11,000/ton

Factors Affecting Price

Prices vary based on moisture content, calorific value, ash content, and delivery distance.

item.title: Rice Husk Pellets: Benefits, Manufacturing & Applications
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Understanding rice husk pellets - a sustainable fuel from Punjab's abundant agricultural waste.
item.content:encoded:
Understanding rice husk pellets - a sustainable fuel from Punjab's abundant agricultural waste.

Benefits of Rice Husk Pellets

  • Abundant raw material in Punjab
  • High calorific value (3500-4000 kcal/kg)
  • Low moisture content
  • Carbon neutral fuel

Manufacturing Process

Rice husk is collected, dried, ground, and compressed into uniform pellets using pellet mills.

item.title: Biomass Pellet Plant Subsidy in Punjab 2025: Complete Guide
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Everything you need to know about government subsidies and incentives for setting up biomass pellet plants in Punjab.
item.content:encoded:
Everything you need to know about government subsidies and incentives for setting up biomass pellet plants in Punjab.

Available Government Schemes

  • MNRE Biomass Power Projects: Up to 25% capital subsidy
  • NABARD Refinancing: Low-interest loans for agro-processing
  • Punjab State Incentives: Additional 15% state subsidy
  • MSME Benefits: Tax holidays and concessions

Eligibility Criteria

Entrepreneurs, farmer groups, and industries can apply for subsidies based on project capacity and location.

item.title: How to Make Biomass Pellets: Step-by-Step Manufacturing Process
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Learn the complete manufacturing process of biomass pellets from raw material collection to final packaging.
item.content:encoded:
Learn the complete manufacturing process of biomass pellets from raw material collection to final packaging.

Step-by-Step Process

  1. Raw Material Collection: Gather agricultural waste, sawdust, or wood chips
  2. Size Reduction: Hammer mill reduces material to uniform size
  3. Drying: Reduce moisture to 10-15%
  4. Pelletizing: Compress in pellet mill at high pressure
  5. Cooling: Cool pellets to room temperature
  6. Screening: Remove fines and dust
  7. Packaging: Bag in 25kg or 50kg bags

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Biomass Pellet Making Process | Manufacturing Guide India
Step-by-step guide to biomass pellet manufacturing. Raw material preparation, drying, pelletizing, cooling & packaging process explained.
biomass pellet making process

item.title: Torrefied Biomass Pellets: Technical Specifications & Advantages
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Understanding torrefied pellets - the advanced biomass fuel with coal-like properties and superior energy density.
item.content:encoded:
Understanding torrefied pellets - the advanced biomass fuel with coal-like properties and superior energy density.

Technical Specifications

  • Calorific Value: 5000-5500 kcal/kg (vs 4000 for regular pellets)
  • Moisture Content: Less than 3%
  • Energy Density: 30% higher than wood pellets
  • Hydrophobic: Water resistant for outdoor storage

Advantages

Torrefied pellets can directly replace coal in existing boilers without modifications.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Torrefied Biomass Pellets | Black Pellets Technical Guide
Complete technical specifications of torrefied biomass pellets. Higher calorific value, water resistance & coal replacement potential.
torrefied biomass pellets

  • Medium Unit (3 TPH): ₹80 Lakhs - 1.2 Crores
  • Large Unit (5+ TPH): ₹1.5-3 Crores

ROI Analysis

With current pellet prices and demand, most units achieve break-even within 18-24 months.

item.title: Paddy Straw Pellets: Converting Parali into Profitable Fuel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: How Punjab farmers and entrepreneurs can convert parali into profitable paddy straw pellets.
item.content:encoded:
How Punjab farmers and entrepreneurs can convert parali into profitable paddy straw pellets.

Parali Collection

Punjab generates 20+ million tons of paddy straw annually. Proper collection and baling is the first step.

Processing Challenges

  • High silica content requires proper equipment
  • Seasonal availability needs storage planning
  • Logistics for collection from fields

Market Opportunity

Growing demand from thermal power plants and industries creates steady market.

item.title: Biomass Boiler Efficiency: Optimization Tips for Industries
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Practical tips to optimize your industrial biomass boiler for maximum efficiency and cost savings.
item.content:encoded:
Practical tips to optimize your industrial biomass boiler for maximum efficiency and cost savings.

Optimization Tips

  • Use pellets with consistent moisture content
  • Regular cleaning of heat exchangers
  • Optimize air-fuel ratio
  • Monitor flue gas temperatures
  • Scheduled maintenance program

Common Issues

Clinker formation, incomplete combustion, and slagging can reduce efficiency by 10-20%.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Biomass Boiler Efficiency Guide | Industrial Optimization Tips
Maximize your industrial biomass boiler efficiency. Fuel selection, maintenance tips, combustion optimization & troubleshooting guide.

item.title: Biomass Pellet Quality Standards in India: BIS & ENplus Certification
item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: Complete guide to biomass pellet quality standards, certifications, and testing requirements in India.
item.content:encoded:
Complete guide to biomass pellet quality standards, certifications, and testing requirements in India.

Key Quality Parameters

  • Moisture Content: Max 10%
  • Ash Content: Max 5% (agro), Max 1% (wood)
  • Calorific Value: Min 4000 kcal/kg
  • Diameter: 6-8mm
  • Length: 10-30mm
  • Durability: Min 97.5%

Certifications

BIS (Bureau of Indian Standards) and ENplus are recognized certifications for pellet quality.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Biomass Pellet Quality Standards India | BIS ENplus Guide
Understanding biomass pellet quality standards in India. BIS specifications, ENplus certification, testing parameters & compliance requirements.
biomass pellet quality standards
